content: my knitting life is too generous with me and i sometimes like to give a little back i worked on this hat during a very special time of my life and it s full of feelings i want to share the pattern with you my readers it is a heartfelt gift **a twisted affair** sometimes things get twisted you do your best and hope for the right outcome and it still wraps around itself and makes a tangle i am pretty sure you can apply this truth to something today whatever that is i hope this free hat pattern can help you unwind and get through your life s twists -------------------- this beanie is worked from the bottom up it features a ribbed brim and cables all over the body of the hat **sizes** medium large to fit a head circumference of approx 22½ 23¾ 56 59 5 cm **finished measurements** circumference 18½ 20 46 50 cm un-stretched length 11¼ 28 cm **materials** yarn 2 skeins of luft by woolfok yarns 55% merino / 45% cotton / 109 yd 100 m 50g or approx 163 190 yards 150 173 m of aran weight yarn the sample was made using color l19 needles us 8 5 mm needles other notions tapestry needle blocking aids **gauge** 19 sts and 25 row to 4 10 cm in cabled st pattern on us 8 5 mm needles
